query:
SELECT 
  cv.variant_key,
  cv.variant_name,
  cv.is_active,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cs.id) as total_sessions,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cm.id) as total_messages,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ce.id) as total_events
FROM chatbot_variants cv
LEFT JOIN chatbot_sessions cs ON cv.variant_key = cs.variant_key
LEFT JOIN chatbot_messages cm ON cs.id = cm.session_id
LEFT JOIN chatbot_events ce ON cs.id = ce.session_id
GROUP BY cv.variant_key, cv.variant_name, cv.is_active
ORDER BY cv.variant_key;
